item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Club Quarters Philadelphia - Philadelphia (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Great location! Love this place and all of the things they offer to their guests! Free chilled water was absolutely perfect!
The room wasn't so spacey, but that's okay because on vacation I do not…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Tony Luke's - Philadelphia (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I would have given this place 5 stars for ONE of the sandwiches I had but we tried their cheesesteak with spinach and it was not so great. The spinach was tasteless and the steak was very tough and…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Tinto - Philadelphia (2/5) on Yelp
item.description:
If you like fancy food this is for you
4 people =500$ for some shitty tapas that left me hungry. It was probably appropriate amount of food if you anerexic but if your hungry don't go here. Our…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of The Sweet Life Bakeshop - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place is absolutely amazing. A cute little bakery and the employees are super attentive. I walked in and was bouncing around from one dessert to another deciding if I should make a purchase. The…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Arugula Ristorante - Plymouth Meeting (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Just left this place extremely satisfied. My road dogs and I ventured out for a Cru Thikk meal execution and the food here was straight dominant.
Whatever you do start with the grilled calamari, best…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Sabrina's Cafe - Philadelphia (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Sabrina's (regardless of which location) overall is a solid, safe brunch place to take friends and family from out of town to.
Pros: -- Dishes are very VERY filling -- do not attempt to order…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Chef Vargas - Elkins Park (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: We went on Mexican night; very casual, simple menu which made it easier to choose, all three of us liked our food. I loved the corn appetizer, we had between us, chicken fajitas, salmon tacos and a…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Yokohama Japanese Restaurant - Maple Shade (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Such a pleasant surprise! The outside does no justice for the beautiful decor. Food is fresh and delicious, service is awesome, and there's a full bar! My boyfriend and I will def be returning! Such a…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of The Grog Grill - Bryn Mawr (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: It's a pretty small/cozy bar (so no dancing, pool tables, or room for activity), but the waitresses were able to accommodate the group of people (about 6 people) to a large booth without a problem.…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of The Nail Bar - Newtown Square (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: As someone who had acrylics for 2 years at one point, I consider myself mildly snobbish when getting my nails done. Friendly employees.. Offered tea, wine or water every time and a quality job on my…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Chez Elena Wu Restaurant - Voorhees (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Elena Wu has left this building and now is at Tres Yan and Wu - go there instead!!!

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Marathon - Philadelphia (1/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Really disappointed. I've been to the Marathon at 18/Spruce and had excellent service, drinks and food. Thought that would transfer to this location - not at all.

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Vic Sushi Bar - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Man, do I miss Vic's. This is a special place - super small and definitely not great for groups, but a gem in the city. My favorites here are the tuna dumplings and the tiger roll, and my regular…

item.description:
I came here to get the batteries changed on a couple of watches. Pretty routine, right?
First of all, I dropped off the watches around noon one day and was told to come back sometime the next day to…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Marigold Kitchen - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Went here for my b day everything was awesome the gels are amazing .... Duck sausage was crazy good service was outstanding !! Definitely goin back

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Holy Tomato Pies - Gloucester Township (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I wanted to love this place, but I'm not sure I'm 100% on board. I got two pies shared among 6 people and the crust was so thin that a few of us would have liked to have one more slice to be…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Tiffany Nail & Spa - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Went in today for the first time with two friends. They took such good care of us. Pedicures were so amazing. The services were amazing for such a low price. I'll definitely be back.

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of goPuff Philadelphia - Philadelphia (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: After waiting an HOUR AND A HALF for our delivery we called to check in on it and they cancelled on us. They said they were just too busy. Will not be ordering from here again

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Philadelphia (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I went here with a group for my birthday. I checked in multiple times with the restaurant to make sure they had my reservation and that they noted that I wanted to be seated in the vault. We we…

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Helm - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Best resturant ive ever bin to the roasted carrots were outa this world and the mussels dont even get me started !!! Everything was awsome !!!

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Arugula Ristorante - Plymouth Meeting (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: The octopus was duckin slam town and those artichokes that were grilled were unbelievable!!!!! Deff goin back

item.title: Akshay S.'s Review of Passport Health - Philadelphia (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I was really impressed with the service and knowledge of the nurse who helped me. I had been dreading the visit because of how expensive vaccines are and how I thought I would come out of the office…
